channel.title: LINQPad on Shrayas
channel.description: Recent content in LINQPad on Shrayas

item.title: Generate a quick AWS dashboard using LINQPad
item.description: Context Logic Soft’s mainline product – WINBDS is an on premise software i.e. we install it at the client location and we support them remotely. Since a while now,this has been seeing a change. For small installations, usually an instance on the cloud works out cheaper and better. So we’ve begun suggesting people to move to AWS when the installation is small enough. Turns out, if we’re diligent about turning the instances off when we don’t need them, a windows box on AWS is actually pretty affordable.
